title: An End To Gerrymandering?
description: In the final episode of our gerrymandering series we consider some more radical electoral reforms and look back on the lessons we've learned.

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Galen Druke
itunes:subtitle: In the final episode of our gerrymandering series we consider some more radical electoral reforms and look back on the lessons we've learned.
